Class DateAndTimeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • DateAndTimeHandler
  • public class DateAndTimeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Description: This class is a singleton for handling the date and time.

      boolean checkDate​(java.lang.String date)

      boolean checkTime​(java.lang.String time)
      Description: This methods will prompt the user to set the time and check if its valid.
      static DateAndTimeHandler getInstance()
      Description: This method gets the instance of DateAndTimeHandler (singleton design pattern).

        public static DateAndTimeHandler getInstance()
        Description: This method gets the instance of DateAndTimeHandler (singleton design pattern). synchronized is so we do not access the same object at the same time.
        Returns:
        The DateAndTimeHandler object.

      • checkTime

        public boolean checkTime​(java.lang.String time)
        Description: This methods will prompt the user to set the time and check if its valid.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
